# Averaging Metrics for Analyte Analysis
### factors - don't rerun unless absolutely necessay
```{r}
# make analysis groups a factor (reporting area, geographic group, pcb group, site, pah group)
# change to a factor - all data
data$pcb_group <- as.factor(data$pcb_group)
data$geo_group <- as.factor(data$geo_group)
data$reporting_area <- as.factor(data$reporting_area)
data$site_name <- as.factor(data$site_name)
data$PAHgroup8 <- as.factor(data$pah_group)

# remove outliers
data_clean_p450 <- data %>% filter(!p450_outlier)
data_clean_sod <- data %>% filter(!sod_outlier)
data_clean_condition_factor <- data %>% filter(!condition_factor_outlier)
data_clean_avg_thickness <- data %>% filter(!avg_thickness_outlier)
```

### averaging
```{r}

library(dplyr)

library(dplyr)

df_summary <- data %>%
  group_by(site_name) %>%  # Group by site name
  summarise(
    # Averaging numerical values per site
    p450 = mean(p450, na.rm = TRUE),
    sod = mean(sod, na.rm = TRUE),
    ci_wet_volume = mean(ci_wet_volume, na.rm = TRUE),
    ci_wet_shell_weight = mean(ci_wet_shell_weight, na.rm = TRUE),
    ci_pollution = mean(ci_pollution, na.rm = TRUE),
    shell_thickness = mean(shell_thickness, na.rm = TRUE),

    # Retaining representative categorical values (assuming they are consistent per site)
    site_number = first(site_number),
    reporting_area = first(reporting_area),
    pcb_group = first(pcb_group),
    pah_group = first(pah_group),
    latitude = first(latitude),
    longitude = first(longitude),
    geo_group = first(geo_group)
  )

head(df_summary)

write.csv(df_summary, "all_metrics_avg_with_all_groups.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
